text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] Bigu: «Parvardigoram ʙa adolat farmon dodaast va [inki hama co, ʙa viƶa] dar har mascide [xolisona] ruji xesro ʙa suji [qiʙlai] U kuned va Uro dar holi [ʙa duo va nijois] ʙixoned ki din [-i xud]-ro ʙarojas xolis namudaed. [Va ʙidoned] Hamon guna ki sumoro dar oƣoz padid ovard, [pas az marg niz ʙori digar ʙa sujas] ʙozmegarded
